title.rendered: Natural Jute Roll Fabric for Tray Packing, Wedding Party Home, Flowers, Gift Wrapping, DIY Craft & Decoration (4.5 Meter) (for Multipurpose use) (Blue)

content.rendered: Burlap is a coarse woven fabric made from 100% jute fibers. It is a strong and durable product that can be used in your garden to reduce soil erosion and control weeds. Our burlap is perfect for most arts, crafts, interior design projects such as table runners, backdrops, matting, costumes, school projects, roman shades and much more. folding may result in wrinkles or folds in the burlap, which can easily be ironed out using an iron on a low setting.

excerpt.rendered:
Package Includes : 1 Piece of Jute Roll Color : Natural Blue color Size : 19 Inch 4.5 Meter (5 Yard)

This Jute Roll is perfect for most arts, crafts, interior design projects such as table runners, backdrops, matting, costumes, school projects, roman shades, wedding, outside garden, craft projects and much more.
